lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.controller

Class CrisisController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.controller.AbstractController
      • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.controller.CrisisController

  • public class CrisisController
extends AbstractController
    The crisis controller deals with any functions to do with crises. This includes closing, retrieval, handling and so on. It extends the AbstractController to handle checking of Dt information is correct

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Server server
      Parameter that allows the system to gain server access, the server function lives in the model of the client and has RMI calls to access the server.

      CrisisController()

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCtCrises

        public java.util.ArrayList<CtCrisis> getAllCtCrises()
                                             throws ServerOfflineException,
                                                    ServerNotBoundException
        Returns a list of all crises in the system, without using a logged in user.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of type CtCrisis, which contains all crises currently within the iCrashSystem
        Throws:
        ServerOfflineException - is an error that is thrown when the server is offline or not reachable
        ServerNotBoundException - is only thrown when attempting to access a server which has no current binding. This shouldn't happen, but you never know!

      • getAllCtCrises

        public java.util.ArrayList<CtCrisis> getAllCtCrises(EtCrisisStatus status)
                                             throws ServerOfflineException,
                                                    ServerNotBoundException
        Returns a list of all crises in the system that match the status type specified, without using a logged in user.
        Parameters:
        status - The EtCrisisStatus to filter the list of CtCrises by
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of type CtCrisis, which contains all crises currently within the iCrashSystem
        Throws:
        ServerOfflineException - is an error that is thrown when the server is offline or not reachable
        ServerNotBoundException - is only thrown when attempting to access a server which has no current binding. This shouldn't happen, but you never know!

      • closeServerConnection

        public void closeServerConnection()
        Closes the server connection that is open at the moment.
